Calculate effect size from GLM coefficients

get_effect_size.Rd

Computes the appropriate effect size measure based on the GLM family. For binomial and quasi-binomial families, returns odds ratios (OR). For Poisson and quasi-Poisson families, returns rate ratios (RR). For Gamma and inverse Gaussian families, returns inverse ratios (IR). For other families, returns raw coefficients.

Usage

get_effect_size(coef_table, family)

Arguments

coef_table

A coefficient table from summary(glm_object)$coefficients containing at minimum an "Estimate" column with regression coefficients

family

A family object from the GLM specifying the distribution and link function

Value

A named numeric vector of effect sizes with names matching the predictor names from the coefficient table

Details

The transformation applied depends on the family:

  • binomial, quasibinomial: exp(estimate) for odds ratios

  • poisson, quasipoisson: exp(estimate) for rate ratios

  • Gamma, inverse.gaussian: 1/estimate for inverse ratios

  • quasi: depends on variance function (mu(1-mu) -> OR, mu -> RR)

  • gaussian and others: raw coefficient (no transformation)
